body_html:
@boyangwm @Oldpan @erolrecep Hope it helps.

  • tensorflow-1.7.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl
  • tensorflow-1.8.0rc0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl

Environment:

  • python 3.6
  • Ubuntu Server 16.04
  • CUDA 9.1, CUDNN 7.1, both in usr/local/cuda
  • for tf1.8.0rc0, NCCL2.1 is in /usr/local/nccl_2.1.15-1+cuda9.1_x86_64 (NCCL 2.1.15 O/S agnostic)

body:
@boyangwm @Oldpan @erolrecep Hope it helps.

- [tensorflow-1.7.0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl](https://drive.google.com/open?id=15iGFiagWcwTSzJMpOxYvRad-yKGjTB9J)
- [tensorflow-1.8.0rc0-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl](https://drive.google.com/open?id=1xqHxMrsGQLsZhT0XMBfmJsccjFpJtXa5)

Environment:
- python 3.6
- Ubuntu Server 16.04
- CUDA 9.1, CUDNN 7.1, both in `usr/local/cuda`
- for tf1.8.0rc0, NCCL2.1 is in `/usr/local/nccl_2.1.15-1+cuda9.1_x86_64` (NCCL 2.1.15 O/S agnostic)
